title: The Empire Strikes Back
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Visual Effects
description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

title: Raging Bull
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose self-destructive tendencies, jealousy, and animalistic rage destroyed his career and his relationships.

title: Airplane!

director.name: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker

description: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

title: Caddyshack
description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

title: The Elephant Man
description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

title: Ordinary People
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The accidental death of the older of two sons causes the disintegration of a family.

title: Coal Miner's Daughter
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The story of country music legend Loretta Lynn, from her humble beginnings in a poor Kentucky coal-mining family to her rise to stardom.

title: The Blues Brothers
description: Jake Blues, just out of prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

title: 9 to 5
description: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

title: Private Benjamin
description: A sheltered young high-society woman joins the U.S. Army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.

title: Fame
description: A group of students at a New York City high school for the performing arts try to make it big.

title: Altered States
description: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

title: The Stunt Man
description: A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set and is hired as a stunt man, but he soon finds that the director is a manipulative madman who will do anything to get his shot.

title: The Long Riders
description: The story of the James-Younger gang, a group of outlaws who terrorized the American West in the late 19th century.

title: Tess
description: The story of a young peasant girl in 19th-century England who is seduced and abandoned by a wealthy young man.

title: Kagemusha
description: A petty thief is recruited to impersonate a dying warlord in 16th-century Japan.

title: The Last Metro
production_studio: Les Films du Carrosse, Andrea Films
description: In Nazi-occupied Paris, the wife of a Jewish theater owner struggles to keep the theater open while hiding her husband in the cellar.

title: Heaven's Gate
description: The story of the Johnson County War, a violent conflict between wealthy cattle ranchers and immigrant settlers in 1890s Wyoming.

title: American Gigolo
description: A Los Angeles male escort finds himself in trouble when he is framed for a murder.

title: Brubaker
description: The new warden of a corrupt Southern prison pretends to be an inmate to uncover the truth about the prison's dark secrets.

title: Stir Crazy
description: Two unemployed friends are framed for a bank robbery and sent to prison.

title: Friday the 13th
description: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp that was the site of a child's drowning.

title: Dressed to Kill
description: A mysterious woman is responsible for a series of brutal murders, but is she who she appears to be?

title: The Fog
description: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town, bringing with it the vengeful ghosts of mariners who were murdered there 100 years ago.

title: Melvin and Howard
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: The story of a gas station attendant who claims to be the heir to Howard Hughes's fortune.

title: Popeye
description: The sailor-man travels to a new town and falls in love with Olive Oyl, all while trying to find his long-lost father.

title: Xanadu
description: A struggling artist falls in love with a woman who is actually a Greek Muse.

title: Flash Gordon
description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo to thwart the evil Emperor Ming the Merciless.

title: The Big Red One
description: The story of a U.S. Army sergeant and his squad as they fight their way through World War II.

title: The Changeling
description: A man staying at a secluded historical mansion finds himself being haunted by the presence of a spectre.

title: The Great Santini
description: A gung-ho Marine pilot is a domineering and abusive father to his children.

title: My Bodyguard
description: A new kid in school hires a troubled, oversized teen to be his bodyguard.

title: The Ninth Configuration
description: A new psychiatrist arrives at a remote castle that serves as a mental institution for military personnel, but he has a secret of his own.

title: Cannibal Holocaust
description: A documentary crew disappears in the Amazon rainforest, and a rescue team finds their lost footage.

title: The Gods Must Be Crazy
description: A Coca-Cola bottle dropped from an airplane in the Kalahari Desert disrupts the peaceful lives of a tribe of Bushmen.

title: Atlantic City
description: In a decaying Atlantic City, a small-time gangster and a young casino waitress find their lives intersecting.

title: Breaker Morant
description: The true story of three Australian soldiers who are court-martialed for war crimes during the Boer War.

title: Resurrection
description: A woman discovers she has the power to heal people after a near-death experience.

title: Somewhere in Time
description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.
